values: 健康的，健全的，完好的；可靠的，牢固的；正确的，明智的；彻底的，充分的；声音，响声
To sound means to make a noise.
The alarm clock sounded and woke us all up.

To sound is to emit or produce a noise or to make a particular impression or effect.
Sound is the vibrations that travel through the air and can be heard by the ear.
noun, verb, adjective
